S6.T2.caption: TABLE II: Testing Metrics for the FL and ML Models
S6.T2.table:
Response Time Throughput
MSE MAE MSE MAE
FL 0.00521 0.02497 0.00266 0.01487
ML 0.00084 0.01557 0.00018 0.00649
references:
For evaluating the testing metrics, we check table II. We notice that for the response time the MSE and MAE are almost the same for both the FL and ML models.
In terms of throughput, it can be observed that the ML model has lower error rates compared to the FL model, although the difference is not significant.
